What's appening?

Fred de la Bretonière and Shabbies Amsterdam choose Apps4Fashion

Both lifestyle labels recently launched their digital catalogue and mobile order entry tool in one easy-to-use app to enable their international sales team to process sales orders professionally and efficiently as off SS17 pre-sale directly on an iPad and send them automatically straight into the central back office system. more ›

Luxor successfully launches B2B webshop

Recently Luxor, manufacturer and distributor of several beachwear brands like Shiwi, Baku, PILYQ Barcelona and TKEES, successfully launched their B2B webshop developed by Apps4Fashion. more ›

Apps4Fashion welcomes Indepedent Fashion Industries (SevenOneSeven, Red & Blu, Charlie)

We warmly welcome Independent Fashion Industries as newest member of the Apps4Fashion "family". For SS17 the Belgium and Dutch sales team will use our digital work book with integrated mobile order entry tool for pre-ordering the collections of Red & Blu, Charlie and SevenOneSeven. more ›

Royal RepubliQ launches SS17 with Apps4Fashion

Apps4Fashion warmly welcomes Royal RepubliQ! With this unique Danish brand another footwear and accessory brand starts using our sales tools for a professional, efficient and secure mobile order entry as add-on to their back office system (E-conomic). more ›

Hälsa välkommen Ten Points

Apps4Fashion warmly welcomes Ten Points! With this amazing Swedish manufacturer another footwear brand has selected our sales tools for a professional, efficient and secure mobile order entry as add-on to their back office system (Navision). more ›

SAND Copenhagen implements Apps4Fashion

We warmly welcome SAND Copenhagen as they have selected Apps4Fashion as their mobile B2B e-commerce platform. more ›

Apps4Fashion in the news!

Apps4Fashion the worlds leading supplier of mobile sales tools in the fashion, footwear and apparel industry. “We simply deliver the tools a salesperson needs to do his job quickly, correctly and efficiently”, says managing director Nick Andriesse. more ›

Proud and grateful to see so many happy faces at CIFF and Revolver

Being at the CIFF and Revolver and see so many happy faces among our customers using apps4fashion and do their business professionally and efficiently makes us proud and grateful. We also want to thank our local Danish partner Agidon A/S for the great effort and service their are providing continuously more ›

New York, New York

Apptitude was in NYC to help the Scotch & Soda USA team get Apps4Fashion ready for use at New York Fashion Week!
